name: Umbrella Adventure
description: This game follows a wacky Umbrella, Ummy is blown of the beach and is now on a quest to find her way back to the beach but it won't be easy! Seth is a mischievous tyrant trying to stop Ummy in her path. Find out why he is doing this and the secrets Ummy has locked deep in her soul...  (Arrow keys to move 60-80 minutes for full experience)
